Class ExecutorSpigot

java.lang.Object
nl.pim16aap2.animatedarchitecture.spigot.util.implementations.ExecutorSpigot
All Implemented Interfaces:
IExecutor
@Singleton public final class ExecutorSpigot extends Object implements IExecutor
Implementation of IExecutor for the Spigot platform.

Pim
